device_mount: Handheld; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table); Mounted to wall
scale: Near, personal space; Social space; Room
use_cases_desc: Extend the virtual workspace across displays with a portable projector
contribution_desc: A system which uses a portable projector (handheld or head-mounted) to extend a virtual workspace across multiple perspective-aware displays and allows users to dynamically move the content across these displays. Projection makes interacting across displays more seamless and less demanding.
tracking_characteristic: Tracking users only; Location 3D; Outside-in tracking
